com.rjrudin.marklogic.junit

Class XmlHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.Assert
      • com.rjrudin.marklogic.junit.XmlHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseTestHelper

    public class XmlHelper
extends org.junit.Assert
    Helper for tests that work with XML via JDOM2 and XmlUnit. Extends Assert, as this class makes assertions and it's also handy to extend this class when writing a test class.
